bill_title: provide for a sales tax holiday on tangible personal property.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for a sales tax holiday on tangible personal property. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The tax imposed by § 10-45-2 and the corresponding tax imposed by chapter 10-52 does not apply to sales of tangible personal property consisting of goods, wares, or merchandise if the tangible personal property is purchased between 12:01 a.m. of the third Saturday in August through midnight of that same day. Section 2. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The provisions of this Act do not apply to other goods or services taxed by other provisions of chapters 10-45, 10-46, and 10-52. Nor do the provisions of this Act apply to purchases made through the mail, catalog, or Internet. Section 3. The secretary of revenue may promulgate rules, pursuant to chapter 1-26, concerning the application and administration of the sales tax holiday.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
